meanings.definition: To strike with the open hand, a stick, etc., especially on the buttocks, as in punishment.
meanings.sent1: The naughty child was spanked for misbehaving.
meanings.sent2: She spanked the dust off the old rug.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy got spanked gently for chewing on the slipper.
meanings.sent4: The storm spanked the trees with strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The chef spanked the dough to shape it perfectly.
